examples: the shaking of his fingers as he lit his pipe

results.definition: move or jerk quickly and involuntarily up and down or sideways
examples: His hands were trembling when he signed the document

results.definition: vibrating slightly and irregularly; as e.g. with fear or cold or like the leaves of an aspen in a breeze
examples: the quaking child asked for more
quivering leaves of a poplar tree
sparkling light from the shivering crystals of the chandelier
